section.title: Introduction
section.para: This document describes the aggregator sources provided with the GT 4.0. Aggregator sources collect information from or about WS-Resources and feed that information to aggregator sinks (such as the Index Service and Trigger Service). The following graphic describes the basic information flow including the three standard aggregator sources: Query Aggregator Source, Subscription Aggregator Source and Execution Source.
